title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Beat eggs and mix with cheese, salt, and pepper.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Stir in egg mixture quickly to create a creamy sauce.
Serve with parsley.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for 1 hour.
Cook onion and garlic until soft.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a pan.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve with sesame seeds on top.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook onion and garlic until soft.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in taco seasoning and cook for 5 minutes.
Serve in taco shells with toppings.

title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
Layer them with basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Cream butter and sugar together.
Add egg and vanilla, mix well.
Stir in flour and chocolate chips.
Scoop onto baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add shrimp, salt, and pepper, and cook until pink.
Squeeze lemon juice over shrimp and garnish with parsley.

title: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Heat olive oil and cook onion until soft.
Add mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in arborio rice and cook for 2 minutes.
Gradually add broth, stirring until absorbed.
Finish with parmesan cheese.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk egg and milk together.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Heat butter in a pan and pour in batter.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and cook onion until soft.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Stir in mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes.
Sprinkle flour and mix well.
Add sour cream, salt, and pepper, and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Quiche Lorraine
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Cook bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs and cream together, season with salt and pepper.
Spread bacon in pie crust, pour egg mixture over, and top with cheese.
Bake for 30-35 minutes.

title: Chili Con Carne
instructions: Cook onion and garlic until soft.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomatoes, beans, and chili powder.
Simmer for 30 minutes, season with salt and pepper.

title: Banana Bread
instructions: Preheat oven to 175°C.
Mash bananas and mix with sugar and eggs.
Stir in melted butter, flour, and baking soda.
Pour into a loaf pan and bake for 60 minutes.

title: Beef Wellington
instructions: Sear the beef in a hot pan and let it cool.
Finely chop mushrooms and sauté until moisture evaporates.
Wrap the beef in prosciutto and mushroom mixture.
Roll in puff pastry, brush with egg yolk, and bake at 200°C for 25-30 minutes.

title: Ratatouille
instructions: Dice all vegetables.
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft.
Add remaining vegetables and cook until tender.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve warm.

title: Pad Thai
ingredients: Bean sprouts, peanuts, and lime for garnish
instructions: Soak rice noodles in hot water until soft.
Stir-fry shrimp or chicken until cooked.
Push to the side, scramble eggs, then mix with noodles.
Add fish sauce, tamarind, and sugar, and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Serve garnished with bean sprouts, peanuts, and lime.

title: Tiramisu
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until creamy.
Fold in mascarpone cheese.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer in a dish.
Spread mascarpone mixture over layers, repeat, and chill for 4 hours.
Dust with cocoa powder before serving.

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: Olive oil, oregano, salt, and pepper
instructions: Chop tomatoes, cucumber, and onion into bite-sized pieces.
Combine in a bowl with olives and feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil, sprinkle with oregano, salt, and pepper.
Toss gently and serve.
